comment: Like many others have said prior to me, this is a VERY difficult. With that being said I was able to get an A in the class. This required doing ALL of the online quizzes, homework, and or course A LOT of studying. In other words get ready to spend many nights and long weekends learning statistics. Unless your a masochist, don't take this class.
Her test are nothing like the homework or problems from the book. She gives wayyyy to much homework that will take up your whole week pretty much. Save yourself and do not take her.

Ok she is NOT as bad as they say she is. Is she a great teacher? no, does she work with you? absolutely! If you show up to every class and make an A you don't have to take the final! And with homework literally being 55% of your grade, its not hard to make a good grade. You willl have to teach yourself a little bit.

She is worst professor I have ever had! Homework dates change weekly with no notice. She will put things on a test that we halfway covered. She rolls her eyes when people approach her! She is not friendly and talks down to students! She also goes against what her syllabus says!DO NOT TAKE HER!!!

Professor Brown literally has no interest in teaching this class at all.  She is rude and unapproachable and has strict office hours that you cannot even go see her for.  She's always late for class and still expects us to take exams in <40 minutes.  Worst math teacher I've had so far, she doesn't explain things in depth or well at all.

The worst professor I had at Kennesaw, by far. She should not be a teacher. She is petty, rude, inconsiderate, condescending and unknowledgable. She was late 90% of the time. On an exam day, she was 20+ minutes late. She still expected students to take the exam. She told one student they'd have to choose between her exam and their next class.

This instructor is not approachable at all.  She doesnt want to help with anything, does not explain things well, her nots are difficult to understand. Will not change grades on homework not friendly, HOMEWORK PLUS ELEARNING: too much work load for 3 crd hours.FACT--- take someone ELSE.. PERIOD!

Professor Brown is not approachable, helpful, or nice. Homework due dates vary day-to-day and if she decides to change a homework grade overnight, do not expect an e-mail and do not wait for an in class announcement or it will be too late. She is very knowledgeable of the subject matter but obviously has no desire to help students understand.

Professor Brown is not approachable at all. If you're having difficulty with online assignments she gets very irritated when you send emails or ask questions. Dates for homework assignments change frequently. Nothing is stable in this class. I learned more from the online homework "help" than I did in this class.

Probably the worst professor I've had so far. Her notes are unclear and the homework she gives doesn't help at all with what was "learned" in class. She's hard to understand because of the way she talks and will change things on the test while you are taking it. I would just suggest on not even trying to take this woman as your teacher.
